<Extension()> Public Function SetHandlerLifetime (builder As IHttpClientBuilder, handlerLifetime As TimeSpan) As IHttpClientBuilder
static member SetHandlerLifetime : Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder * TimeSpan -> Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder

summary.span: 设置可重复使用 实例的时长。

span.span: Sets the length of time that a instance can be reused.

summary.span: 每个已命名的客户端都可自行配置处理程序生存期值。

span.span: Each named client can have its own configured handler lifetime value.
The default value is two minutes.

summary.span: 将生存期设置为 可禁用处理程序到期。

span.span: Set the lifetime to to disable handler expiry.

para.span: @No__t 的默认实现将对工厂创建的 @no__t 1 实例进行缓冲，以减少资源消耗。

span.span: The default implementation of will pool the instances created by the factory to reduce resource consumption.

para.span: 此设置配置在计划从池中删除和处置处理程序之前，处理程序可以进行缓冲的时间量。

span.span: This setting configures the amount of time a handler can be pooled before it is scheduled for removal from the pool and disposal.

para.span: 由于每个处理程序通常都管理自己的基础 HTTP 连接，所以有必要汇集处理程序；创建的处理程序数量如果多于必需的数量，则可能导致连接延迟。

span.span: Pooling of handlers is desirable as each handler typically manages its own underlying HTTP connections; creating more handlers than necessary can result in connection delays.

para.span: 某些处理程序还会使连接无限期打开，这会阻止处理程序对 DNS 更改做出响应。

span.span: Some handlers also keep connections open indefinitely which can prevent the handler from reacting to DNS changes.

para.span: 应选择 "" 的值，同时了解应用程序对网络环境中的更改做出响应的要求。

span.span: The value of should be chosen with an understanding of the application's requirement to respond to changes in the network environment.

para.span: 处理程序将不会立即释放处理程序。

span.span: Expiry of a handler will not immediately dispose the handler.

para.span: 过期的处理程序放置在一个单独的池中，该池将按间隔处理，以便仅在其不可访问时处置处理程序。

span.span: An expired handler is placed in a separate pool which is processed at intervals to dispose handlers only when they become unreachable.

para.span: 使用长时间 @no__t 的实例将会阻止在所有引用被垃圾回收之前释放基础 。

span.span: Using long-lived instances will prevent the underlying from being disposed until all references are garbage-collected.
